package.name: virelex
package.description:
A ROS 2 package for:
- planning actions (action_planner) - detecting collisions (collision_detector) - processing LiDAR point clouds (lidar_processor) - computing robot state (state_processor)
- customized message format for LiDAR point clouds (cluster_msg) - customized message format for robot info (robot_info_msg) - customized message format for state information (state_msg)
package.author: Xi Lin
